title: custom authorityschema can be assigned to proxy users
body:
authority enhancesample
```
- !AUTHORITY
  users:
    - root@:root
    - user1@:user1
    - user1@127.0.0.1:user1
  provider:
    type: SCHEMA_PRIVILEGES_PERMITTED
    props:
      user-schema-mappings: root@=test, user1@127.0.0.1=db_dal_admin, user1@=test, user1@=db_dal_admin
```

when using root login from any hostyou can use database test.
when using user1 login from 127.0.0.1you can use database db_dal_admin.
when using user1 login from any other hostyou can use database test and db_dal_admin.

title: proxyschema
body:
authority enhancesample
rules:
  - !AUTHORITY
    users:
      - root@:root
      - root1@:root1
    provider:
      type: CUSTOM_PRIVILEGES_PERMITTED
      props: 
        user-schema-mappings: root=test, root1=db_dal_admin, root1=test
when using root login proxyyou can use database test.
when using root1 login proxyyou can use database db_dal_admin and test.
